background-default.comment: Usually used for the page background and elements that should not elevate from the background.

background-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “background-default” has a hovered state.

background-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “background-default” has a pressed state.

surface-default.comment: Usually used for containers that need to be elevated.

surface-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “surface-default” has a hovered state.

surface-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “surface-default” has a pressed state.

surface-overlay-default.comment: Usually used for containers that need to be more elevated.

surface-overlay-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “surface-overlay-default” has a hovered state.

surface-overlay-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “surface-overlay-default” has a pressed state.

surface-neutral-default.comment: Used as a background for neutral surfaces.

surface-critical-default.comment: Used as a background for critical surfaces.

surface-success-default.comment: Used as a background for success surfaces.

on-surface-default.comment: Usually used for elements that need contrast on surfaces or background

on-surface-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “on-surface-default” has a hovered state.

on-surface-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “on-surface-default” has a pressed state.

surface-on-image-default.comment: Usually used for containers on images

surface-highlight-default.comment: Usually used for containers that need to be highlighted.

surface-highlight-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “surface-highlight-default” has a hovered state.

surface-highlight-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “surface-highlight-default” has a pressed state.

surface-info-default.comment: Used as a background for info surfaces.

surface-warning-default.comment: Used as a background for warning surfaces.

action-primary-default.comment: Used for containers that are high emphasis action elements.

action-primary-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “action-primary-default” has a hovered state.

action-primary-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “action-primary-default” has a pressed state.

action-primary-disabled.comment: Used if a component with “action-primary-default” has a disabled state.

action-neutral-default.comment: Used for containers that are low emphasis action elements.

action-neutral-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “action-neutral-default” has a hovered state.

action-neutral-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “action-neutral-default” has a pressed state.

action-neutral-disabled.comment: Used if a component with “action-neutral-default” has a disabled state.

interactive-primary-default.comment: Used for icon and text that are high emphasis interactive elements.

interactive-primary-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-primary-default” has a hovered state.

interactive-primary-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-primary-default” has a pressed state.

interactive-primary-disabled.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-primary-default” has a disabled state.

interactive-neutral-default.comment: Used for icon and text that are low emphasis interactive elements.

interactive-neutral-hovered.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-neutral-default” has a hovered state.

interactive-neutral-pressed.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-neutral-default” has a pressed state.

interactive-neutral-disabled.comment: Used if a component with “interactive-neutral-default” has a disabled state.
